channel.title: [REQ][PI] Achievement tab as a seperate interface
channel.description: can somebody write out the old achievement tab[like quest tab] but on a whole new interface rather than replacing the old quest tab. i tried doing the method of replacing the old quest tab with adding on the achievement tab but it wouldnt work. so would anyone else help me out? thanks much l0lc0pt3r
